## R Markdown


```{r 1, warning=FALSE}
library(plotly)

d <- diamonds[sample(nrow(diamonds), 1000), ]

p <- plot_ly(
  d, x = ~carat, y = ~price,
  # Hover text:
  text = ~paste("Price: ", price, '$<br>Cut:', cut),
  color = ~carat, size = ~carat
)

p
```
